author: Your Name
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Toxicity cog! Use `[p]help toxic` to see available commands. Make sure to configure the cog with `[p]toxic config view` before use.
name: Toxicity
short: Vote-based kick/ban system for server members with matching roles.
description: Allows server members to initiate votes to kick or ban other members with the same roles. Features configurable vote duration, vote threshold, kick/ban mode toggle, and comprehensive safety checks to prevent abuse.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about active votes including the initiator, target, and reason for votes. Vote data is automatically deleted when votes conclude. No personal data is stored permanently.
